content.p: Chair of Council (Chair): Sir Keith O'Nions President and Vice-Chancellor: Professor Jane Norman Vice-Chair of Council: Nora Senior Two external members of Council: Sonya Leydecker Two academic members of Council: Professor Sam Kingman, Dr Pearl Agyakwa A student member to be selected from the two student members of Council: Nicola Maina (Union Development Officer) Secretary: Registrar (acting) (Jason Carter) The quorum for the Committee shall be not less than half of the total number of members with a minimum of two external members in attendance. (ToR approved by Nominations Committee 1 October 2021) Return to Committees list Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
